Articles.Content:
Last time I checked there was a kerbal ejection system mod somewhere around here, I know that currently the parachute mod is busted.....

Yea That Parachute could have stopped me from going insane and KSP going insane along side me http://www.twitch.tv/dilind/c/2325873

R.I.P

Bill Kerman

9:23PM

That same weird spazz out of his model near the end of that video happened to him and he then killed himself. I have a few of his last moments captured. All of this because I didn't have a Parachute

R.I.P

KSP.exe

9:27PM

It crashed.

Edited May 24, 2013 by Dilin
This is awesome!
Updated Front Page for Release 2: new parts for the Mysterious Projects pack.
I like the new engines and legs, very Retro
Thanks Devo. New copy uploaded to fix a small issue.
Looks like an claw from a evil robot Nice work (Y)
Cool parts.

These legs work great if for some reason you decide to try and land an Orion. (Well actually they get a bit twitchy if you put all the weight on them, the game doesn't seem to know what to do with all that mass, but that's not unique to these landing legs. They are great for helping it not topple over.)

Someone in the Orion thread is also using them to help grab an asteroid.

Orion aka "Ol' Boom-boom" post 696

awesome, thanks for sharing that post. I've done some pretty funny stuff with them, like turning over a toppled Duna lander. I'm looking forward to seeing more ships with them, especially the original size legs.

Also, I would get a kick out of it if anyone could tell me where the inspiration for these came from.

Edited June 23, 2013 by Nazari1382
I would guess Mars Attacks
Hmm, did you picked the prototype from the *spoilersspoilers*crashed UFO near the Pole?*endspoilers*
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/41290-Firewalker-Skids Edited August 8, 2013 by Nazari1382

False items circulating:

Rest assured that the scientists at Mysterious Projects are handling recent events at KSC. They will get to the bottom of this, and all details of this event have been documented. Ignore these crazy stories from the newsstand!
Are you making a Delorean model? Because that would be the most amazing thing ever!
There are multiple parts being worked on for release 3.
I'm releasing R3. Spaceport is flipping out on me when I try to login so the download is available from mediafire. I welcome your feedback on this - I spent a lot of time on it.
it drives very wierd mate, what's going on with the wheels?

What issues are you having with the wheels? I just opened up the craft file and they are working, although the rear wheels are placed a little high. I may change the stats on the wheels but I haven't had any weird things happen while driving around with them lately - you are supposed to be able to slide with them btw.

Oh my god.

A Delorean in KSP?

*Faints*
Ok, that car really needs to be a 64 Chevy Malibu that glows in the dark and vaporizes any Kerbal that opens the trunk.
Looks Amazing, can't wait to try it

double post Edited August 24, 2013 by AnnieBonz
double post

Ok, that car really needs to be a 64 Chevy Malibu that glows in the dark and vaporizes any Kerbal that opens the trunk.

HAHAHA. Best Movie Emilio ever made.
works perfectly! Thanks!
Needs more feedback, and pictures. I want to see other people on the Mun in a Delorean
